name: ShyChess
description: ShyChess is a puzzle game where the ShyGirls must cross through chessboards avoiding dangerous zones, marked by thechess pieces attack patterns. Go through room to room while discovering more about the ShyGirls history, escape with as many of them as you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 4 MB RAM Storage: 220 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel core i5 Memory: 4 MB RAM Storage: 220 MB available space
